sn55.25:1.2: Tena kho pana samayena saraṇāni sakko kālaṅkato hoti.
sn55.25:1.5: Tatra sudaṁ sambahulā sakkā saṅgamma samāgamma ujjhāyanti khīyanti vipācenti:
sn55.25:1.7: Ettha dāni ko na sotāpanno bhavissati.
sn55.25:1.8: Yatra hi nāma saraṇāni sakko kālaṅkato.
sn55.25:1.12: Atha kho mahānāmo sakko yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṁ abhivādetvā ekamantaṁ nisīdi. Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho mahānāmo sakko bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
sn55.25:2.4: Tatra sudaṁ, bhante, sambahulā sakkā saṅgamma samāgamma ujjhāyanti khīyanti vipācenti:
sn55.25:2.6: Ettha dāni ko na sotāpanno bhavissati.
sn55.25:2.7: Yatra hi nāma saraṇāni sakko kālaṅkato.
sn55.25:3.1: “Yo so, mahānāma, dīgharattaṁ upāsako buddhaṁ saraṇaṁ gato dhammaṁ saraṇaṁ gato saṅghaṁ saraṇaṁ gato, so kathaṁ vinipātaṁ gaccheyya.
sn55.25:3.2: Yañhi taṁ, mahānāma, sammā vadamāno vadeyya:
sn55.25:3.3: ‘dīgharattaṁ upāsako buddhaṁ saraṇaṁ gato dhammaṁ saraṇaṁ gato saṅghaṁ saraṇaṁ gato’, saraṇāniṁ sakkaṁ sammā vadamāno vadeyya.
sn55.25:3.4: Saraṇāni, mahānāma, sakko dīgharattaṁ upāsako buddhaṁ saraṇaṁ gato dhammaṁ saraṇaṁ gato saṅghaṁ saraṇaṁ gato, so kathaṁ vinipātaṁ gaccheyya.
sn55.25:4.1: Idha, mahānāma, ekacco puggalo buddhe ekantagato hoti abhippasanno—
sn55.25:4.2: itipi so bhagavā …pe… satthā devamanussānaṁ buddho bhagavāti.
sn55.25:4.6: So āsavānaṁ khayā anāsavaṁ cetovimuttiṁ paññāvimuttiṁ diṭṭheva dhamme sayaṁ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja viharati.
sn55.25:4.7: Ayampi kho, mahānāma, puggalo parimutto nirayā parimutto tiracchānayoniyā parimutto pettivisayā parimutto apāyaduggativinipātā.
sn55.25:5.1: Idha pana, mahānāma, ekacco puggalo buddhe ekantagato hoti abhippasanno—
sn55.25:5.2: itipi so bhagavā …pe… satthā devamanussānaṁ buddho bhagavāti.
sn55.25:5.5: hāsapañño javanapañño na ca vimuttiyā samannāgato.
sn55.25:5.6: So pañcannaṁ orambhāgiyānaṁ saṁyojanānaṁ parikkhayā antarāparinibbāyī hoti, upahaccaparinibbāyī hoti, asaṅkhāraparinibbāyī hoti, sasaṅkhāraparinibbāyī hoti, uddhaṁsoto hoti akaniṭṭhagāmī.
sn55.25:5.7: Ayampi kho, mahānāma, puggalo parimutto nirayā parimutto tiracchānayoniyā parimutto pettivisayā parimutto apāyaduggativinipātā.
sn55.25:6.1: Idha pana, mahānāma, ekacco puggalo buddhe ekantagato hoti abhippasanno—
sn55.25:6.2: itipi so bhagavā …pe… satthā devamanussānaṁ buddho bhagavāti.
sn55.25:6.5: na hāsapañño na javanapañño na ca vimuttiyā samannāgato.
sn55.25:6.6: So tiṇṇaṁ saṁyojanānaṁ parikkhayā rāgadosamohānaṁ tanuttā sakadāgāmī hoti, sakideva imaṁ lokaṁ āgantvā dukkhassantaṁ karoti.
sn55.25:6.7: Ayampi kho, mahānāma, puggalo parimutto nirayā parimutto tiracchānayoniyā parimutto pettivisayā parimutto apāyaduggativinipātā.
sn55.25:7.1: Idha pana, mahānāma, ekacco puggalo buddhe ekantagato hoti abhippasanno—
sn55.25:7.2: itipi so bhagavā …pe… satthā devamanussānaṁ buddho bhagavāti.
sn55.25:7.5: na hāsapañño na javanapañño na ca vimuttiyā samannāgato.
sn55.25:7.6: So tiṇṇaṁ saṁyojanānaṁ parikkhayā sotāpanno hoti avinipātadhammo niyato sambodhiparāyaṇo.
sn55.25:7.7: Ayampi kho, mahānāma, puggalo parimutto nirayā parimutto tiracchānayoniyā parimutto pettivisayā parimutto apāyaduggativinipātā.
sn55.25:8.1: Idha pana, mahānāma, ekacco puggalo na heva kho buddhe ekantagato hoti abhippasanno …pe…
sn55.25:8.4: na hāsapañño na javanapañño na ca vimuttiyā samannāgato;
sn55.25:8.7: Tathāgatappaveditā cassa dhammā paññāya mattaso nijjhānaṁ khamanti.
sn55.25:8.8: Ayampi kho, mahānāma, puggalo agantā nirayaṁ agantā tiracchānayoniṁ agantā pettivisayaṁ agantā apāyaṁ duggatiṁ vinipātaṁ.
sn55.25:9.1: Idha pana, mahānāma, ekacco puggalo na heva kho buddhe ekantagato hoti abhippasanno …
sn55.25:9.4: na hāsapañño na javanapañño na ca vimuttiyā samannāgato;
sn55.25:9.8: Ayampi kho, mahānāma, puggalo agantā nirayaṁ agantā tiracchānayoniṁ agantā pettivisayaṁ agantā apāyaṁ duggatiṁ vinipātaṁ.
sn55.25:10.1: Seyyathāpi, mahānāma, dukkhettaṁ dubbhūmaṁ avihatakhāṇukaṁ, bījāni cassu khaṇḍāni pūtīni vātātapahatāni asārādāni asukhasayitāni, devo ca na sammā dhāraṁ anuppaveccheyya.
sn55.25:10.2: Api nu tāni bījāni vuddhiṁ virūḷhiṁ vepullaṁ āpajjeyyun”ti?
sn55.25:10.4: “Evameva kho, mahānāma, idha dhammo durakkhāto hoti duppavedito aniyyāniko anupasamasaṁvattaniko asammāsambuddhappavedito—
sn55.25:10.6: Tasmiñca dhamme sāvako viharati dhammānudhammappaṭipanno sāmīcippaṭipanno anudhammacārī—
sn55.25:11.1: Seyyathāpi, mahānāma, sukhettaṁ subhūmaṁ suvihatakhāṇukaṁ, bījāni cassu akhaṇḍāni apūtīni avātātapahatāni sārādāni sukhasayitāni;
sn55.25:11.3: Api nu tāni bījāni vuddhiṁ virūḷhiṁ vepullaṁ āpajjeyyun”ti?
sn55.25:11.5: “Evameva kho, mahānāma, idha dhammo svākkhāto hoti suppavedito niyyāniko upasamasaṁvattaniko sammāsambuddhappavedito—
sn55.25:11.7: Tasmiñca dhamme sāvako viharati dhammānudhammappaṭipanno sāmīcippaṭipanno anudhammacārī—
sn55.25:11.10: Saraṇāni, mahānāma, sakko maraṇakāle sikkhāya paripūrakārī ahosī”ti.
